title: Day 272 (Nehemiah 11-13, Psalm 126) - Year 3

description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! - Join our PATREON family for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

- Show credits

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- Article: King David's Palace is Found

- Article: 7th Century BC Stamp Bearing Name of King David's Son Unearthed in Jerusalem

- Video: Malachi Overview

- Invite your friends to join us: NT Reading Plan & Journal - Sign up to receive the Priority Time Toolkit PDF
